frontmatter.title: Capability installation
frontmatter.description: A summary of work done on the Cloud Pak for Integration operator experience

internal.content:
---
title: Capability installation
description: A summary of work done on the Cloud Pak for Integration operator experience
---

<PageDescription>
    The Cloud Pak for Integration offers integration administrators OpenShift (and Kubernetes) native management of their integration product instances. 
    We developed this experience for the June 2020 release and have since carried out user testing to understand it's effectiveness
</PageDescription>
